apps.name: PixelPad
apps.description: PixelPad is a free, image editing program that offers powerful tools for photo retouching, graphic design, and digital art, making it a alternative to Adobe Photoshop.

apps.name: TuneBox
apps.description: TuneBox lets you upload and play your own MP3 files.

apps.name: Pomodoro+
apps.description: Pomodoro+ is a fast, distraction-free focus timer with breaks, long breaks, sound, and local stats.

apps.name: HabitLog
apps.description: HabitLog is a simple weekly habit tracker with streaks, import/export, and local saving.

apps.name: CashBook
apps.description: CashBook is a lightweight income/expense tracker with monthly totals, category chart, and export/import.

apps.name: Markdown Memo
apps.description: Markdown Memo is a small note app with a live markdown preview, search, and local storage.

apps.name: FlashFlip
apps.description: FlashFlip is a flashcard app with decks, study mode, scoring, and import/export.

apps.name: Kanban Lite
apps.description: Kanban Lite is a drag-and-drop task board with To Do / Doing / Done columns and local saving.

apps.name: UnitBuddy
apps.description: UnitBuddy converts common units (length, mass, temperature) instantly and can copy results.

apps.name: PalettePop
apps.description: PalettePop generates 5-color palettes with locking, pastel mode, and one-click copy.

apps.name: Typing Sprint
apps.description: Typing Sprint is a typing test (15/30/60s) that shows WPM, accuracy, and best score.

apps.name: QuoteJar
apps.description: QuoteJar stores your favourite quotes with search, random pick, and export/import.
